cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinjin

sentence.kanji: 彼は今日入ったばかりの新人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kyou haita bakari no shinjin desu
sentence.english: He is a newcomer who just started today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinyuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は私の親友です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha watashi no shinyuu desu
sentence.english: He is a close friend.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hahaoya

sentence.kanji: 彼女は2才の子の母親です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha 2 sai no ko no hahaoya desu
sentence.english: She's the mother of a two-year-old kid.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chichioya

sentence.kanji: 彼の父親は先生です。
sentence.romaji: kare no chichioya ha sensei desu 。
sentence.english: His father is a teacher.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's neshin

sentence.kanji: 彼女は4年間熱心に勉強したわ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha 4 nenkan neshin ni benkyou shita wa
sentence.english: She studied hard for four years.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's baishuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は買収されたらしいわ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha baishuu sareta rashii wa
sentence.english: He was bribed, apparently.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heikou

sentence.kanji: 平行に線を引いてください。
sentence.romaji: heikou ni sen wo hiite kudasai
sentence.english: Please draw the lines parallel.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heijitsu

sentence.kanji: 彼は平日がお休みです。
sentence.romaji: kare ha heijitsu ga oyasumi desu
sentence.english: He has weekdays off.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heikin

sentence.kanji: 平均で一日に8時間ぐらい働いています。
sentence.romaji: heikin de ichinichi ni 8 jikan gurai hataraite imasu
sentence.english: I work for about eight hours a day on average.

cards.english: get close to, get familiar with
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitashimu

sentence.kanji: ハイキングは自然に親しむ良い機会ですよ。
sentence.romaji: haikingu ha shizen ni shitashimu ii kikai desu yo
sentence.english: Hiking is a good chance to get close to nature.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukouhei

sentence.kanji: 彼のやり方は不公平です。
sentence.romaji: kare no yarikata ha fukouhei desu
sentence.english: His way of doing things is unfair.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ryoushuusho

sentence.kanji: 領収書をください。
sentence.romaji: ryoushuusho wo kudasai
sentence.english: Please give me a receipt.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arata

sentence.kanji: 新たな計画が進んでいます。
sentence.romaji: arata na keikaku ga susunde imasu
sentence.english: A new plan is in progress.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jinin

sentence.kanji: 社長の辞任が決まりました。
sentence.romaji: shachou no jinin ga kimarimashita
sentence.english: The president's resignation has been agreed upon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oseji

sentence.kanji: 彼はお世辞を言うのが上手い。
sentence.romaji: kare ha oseji wo iu no ga umai
sentence.english: He is good at flattery.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fubyoudou

sentence.kanji: 職場での男女不平等はよく見られるね。
sentence.romaji: shokuba de no danjo fubyoudou ha yoku mirareru ne
sentence.english: You can often find gender inequality in the workplace.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hyouban

sentence.kanji: 評判の良いレストランに行きました。
sentence.romaji: hyouban no ii resutoran ni ikimashita
sentence.english: We went to a restaurant with a good reputation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jisatsu

sentence.kanji: 犯人は警察に捕まる前に自殺しました。
sentence.romaji: hannin ha keisatsu ni tsukamaru mae ni jisatsu shimashita
sentence.english: The criminal committed suicide before he was caught by the police.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chiheisen

sentence.kanji: 地平線に夕日が沈むところだったの。
sentence.romaji: chiheisen ni yuuhi ga shizumu tokoro data no
sentence.english: The sun was setting on the horizon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suiheisen

sentence.kanji: 水平線に太陽が沈んでいった。
sentence.romaji: suiheisen ni taiyou ga shizunde ita
sentence.english: The sun was setting on the horizon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinchiku

sentence.kanji: 彼は去年、家を新築しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kyonen ie wo shinchiku shimashita
sentence.english: He built a new house last year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuunyuu

sentence.kanji: 日本人の平均収入はどの位ですか。
sentence.romaji: nihonjin no heikin shuunyuu ha dono kurai desu ka
sentence.english: What is the national average income in Japan?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyori

sentence.kanji: 彼らは長い距離を歩き続けたんだ。
sentence.romaji: karera ha nagai kyori wo arukitsuzuketa n da
sentence.english: They kept walking a long distance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunri

sentence.kanji: 自民党から新しい党が分離したね。
sentence.romaji: jimintou kara atarashii tou ga bunri shita ne
sentence.english: A new party separated from the Liberal-Democratic Party.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanareru

sentence.kanji: 実家を4年間離れていました。
sentence.romaji: jika wo 4 nenkan hanarete imashita
sentence.english: I was away from my parents' house for 4 years.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanasu

sentence.kanji: 子供の手を離さないでください。
sentence.romaji: kodomo no te wo hanasanaide kudasai
sentence.english: Don't let go of your child's hand.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tairiku

sentence.kanji: ユーラシアは世界で最も大きい大陸です。
sentence.romaji: yu-rashia ha sekai de motomo ookii tairiku desu
sentence.english: Eurasia is the largest continent in the world.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chakuriku

sentence.kanji: 飛行機が無事着陸したわね。
sentence.romaji: hikouki ga buji chakuriku shita wa ne
sentence.english: The airplane landed safely.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ririku

sentence.kanji: まもなく飛行機が離陸します。
sentence.romaji: mamonaku hikouki ga ririku shimasu
sentence.english: The airplane will take off soon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nairiku

sentence.kanji: 彼は中国の内陸を旅行しました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chuugoku no nairiku wo ryokou shimashita
sentence.english: He traveled through inland China.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rikujou

sentence.kanji: あの動物は陸上で生活しています。
sentence.romaji: ano doubutsu ha rikujou de seikatsu shite imasu
sentence.english: That animal lives on land.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's riku

sentence.kanji: ウミガメが陸に上がってきたんだ。
sentence.romaji: umigame ga riku ni agate kita n da
sentence.english: The sea turtles have come up to dry land.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's netai

sentence.kanji: 店に熱帯の果物が並んでいますよ。
sentence.romaji: mise ni netai no kudamono ga narande imasu yo
sentence.english: There are some tropical fruits on display in the shop.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's satsujin

sentence.kanji: その殺人事件は白昼に起こったんだ。
sentence.romaji: sono satsujin jiken ha hakuchuu ni okota n da
sentence.english: The murder happened during daylight.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuushuu

sentence.kanji: 彼の趣味は切手収集です。
sentence.romaji: kare no shumi ha kite shuushuu desu
sentence.english: His hobby is collecting stamps.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's heihou

sentence.kanji: この土地の面積は約100平方メートルです。
sentence.romaji: kono tochi no menseki ha yaku 100 heihoume-toru desu
sentence.english: The area of this land is about 100 square meters.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinkoku

sentence.kanji: これは深刻な問題です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha shinkoku na mondai de su
sentence.english: This is a serious problem.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jikoku

sentence.kanji: ただ今の時刻は6時35分です。
sentence.romaji: tadaima no jikoku ha rokuji sanjuugofun desu
sentence.english: The time just now is 6:35.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsurai

sentence.kanji: この仕事は辛いです。
sentence.romaji: kono shigoto ha tsurai desu
sentence.english: This work is harsh.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouun

sentence.kanji: 幸運にもチケットを手に入れました。
sentence.romaji: kouun ni mo chiketo wo te ni iremashita
sentence.english: Fortunately, I got a ticket.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fushiawase

sentence.kanji: 彼ほど不幸せな人はいないな。
sentence.romaji: kare hodo fushiawase na hito ha inai na
sentence.english: There's no one less happy than he.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koufuku

sentence.kanji: 彼女は幸福な日々を過ごしているわ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha koufuku na hibi wo sugoshite iru wa
sentence.english: She's leading a happy life.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kibou

sentence.kanji: 彼は本社で働くことを希望しています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha honsha de hataraku koto wo kibou shite imasu
sentence.english: He hopes to work at the the head office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitashimi

sentence.kanji: 彼には誰もが親しみを感じます。
sentence.romaji: kare ni ha dare mo ga shitashimi wo kanjimasu
sentence.english: Everyone feels close to him. .

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's geijutsu

sentence.kanji: ここは芸術を愛する国です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha geijutsu wo aisuru kuni desu
sentence.english: This is a country where art is loved.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's junsui

sentence.kanji: 子供の純粋な心を傷付けてはいけません。
sentence.romaji: kodomo no junsui na kokoro wo kizutsukete ha ikemasen
sentence.english: You shouldn't hurt children's pure hearts.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kijutsu

sentence.kanji: 日本の古い料理法についての記述を読んだんだ。
sentence.romaji: nihon no furui ryourihou ni tsuite no kijutsu wo yonda n da
sentence.english: I read a description of ancient Japanese cooking methods.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouhei

sentence.kanji: 賞金をもらったら公平に分けましょう。
sentence.romaji: shoukin wo moratara kouhei ni wakemashou
sentence.english: If we win the prize, let's share it equally.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hihyou

sentence.kanji: その映画はよい批評を得ているんだ。
sentence.romaji: sono eiga ha yoi hihyou wo ete iru n da
sentence.english: The movie received critical acclaim.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's taira

sentence.kanji: その建物の屋根は平らだね。
sentence.romaji: sono tatemono no yane ha taira da　ne
sentence.english: The roof on that building is flat.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yobidasu

sentence.kanji: 親が学校に呼び出されたんだ。
sentence.romaji: oya ga gakou ni yobidasareta n da
sentence.english: My parents were called in to the school.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuushuu

sentence.kanji: 彼は知識の吸収が早いですね。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chishiki no kyuushuu ga hayai desu ne
sentence.english: He absorbs knowledge quickly.
